::Killfest/EndBringer::

Killfest nods at Astroblasts words, about to exit when Motormaster 
tries to stand up. He frowns as the bot's arm falls off, and watches 
him go down on one knee and extend his hand toward him.

"Your commander is severely damage," he says, stating the obvious to 
Astroblast, "If you want, I can have him repaired at my base."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Before Astroblast can take off Motormaster can be seen straining to 
sit up
> and look at his allies of battle, "We , Cough, will keep in touch" 
and then
> strains very hardly to stand up, his left arm falling off at the 
wound. His
> knee buckles under the tear, and he is leaking oil all over his 
damaged
> body. He extends his hand towards Killfest.
